quests.name: Cold the bold
quests.description: Agressive kobolds are bothering villagers. Thin their numbers.

quests.name: This is a stick up
quests.description: Bandits are terrorising villagers moving through the forest. Send them a message.

quests.name: Pack leader
quests.description: An agressive alpha wolf deep in the forest is causing problems. Clear out its den.

quests.name: Orcs and goblins
quests.description: Orcs and goblins have set up camp beyond the dark forest. Clear them out.

quests.name: The Warboss
quests.description: A warboss is leading the orcs. Finish it.

abilities.name: Heavy Strike
abilities.description: Hit an enemy with all your strength dealing heavy damage and stunning them.

abilities.name: Cleave
abilities.description: Sweep your weapon dealing damage to all enemies in a small area.

abilities.name: Rage
abilities.description: A mighty battlecry that hurts you but temporarily boosts your melee capabilities.

abilities.name: Shield Bash
abilities.description: Hit an enemy with your shield dealing damage and stunning them.

abilities.name: Bulwark
abilities.description: You have a chance to block all damage from enemy attacks.

abilities.name: Walking Fortress
abilities.description: Temporarily trade speed and damage for greatly improved defences.

abilities.name: Magic Bolt
abilities.description: Throw a bolt of magic that damages a single enemy.

abilities.name: Fireball
abilities.description: Throw a ball of explosive flames dealing area damage and inflicting burn.

abilities.name: Flame Nova
abilities.description: Engulf enemies around you in fire dealing damage and inflicting moderate burn.

abilities.name: Incinerate
abilities.description: Turn a single enemy into ash.

abilities.name: Zap
abilities.description: Zap an enemy with electricity dealing damage and stunning them.

abilities.name: Lightning Bolt
abilities.description: Blast an enemy with a bolt of lightning, dealing damage in a small area around them.

abilities.name: Lightning Storm
abilities.description: Strike a large area with lightning dealing heavy damage and stunning all caught in the area.

abilities.name: Frost Bolt
abilities.description: Throw a bolt of frost at an enemy dealing damage and slowing them.

abilities.name: Frost Shield
abilities.description: Coat yourself in ice, slowing your actions but greatly increasing your defences.

abilities.name: Blizzard
abilities.description: Pelt an area with ice dealing heavy damage. All in the area are briefly stunned and slowed.

abilities.name: Magic Missiles
abilities.description: Shoot three magical missiles at an enemy.

abilities.name: Confusion
abilities.description: Curse an enemy, confusing them and causing them to take damage over time.

abilities.name: Mayhem
abilities.description: Curse a group of enemies, confusing them and causing them to take damage over time.

abilities.name: Crippling Shot
abilities.description: Shoot an arrow at a foe confusing and slowing them.

abilities.name: Barrage
abilities.description: Shoot multiple arrows at an area damaging all enemies.

abilities.name: Explosive Shot
abilities.description: Shoot an explosive arrow dealing heavy area damage and inflicting stun.

abilities.name: Death Mark
abilities.description: Mark an enemy for death causing them to take damage over time.

abilities.name: Evasion
abilities.description: Your agility gives you a chance to avoid all damage from attacks.

abilities.name: Execute
abilities.description: Eviscerate a single foe.

abilities.name: Web
abilities.description: Cover an area in webbing

abilities.name: Howl
abilities.description: Let out a powerful cry that enrages allies and slows enemies.

abilities.name: Scorching Ray
abilities.description: Shoot a scorching ray

abilities.name: Drain Soul
abilities.description: Drain the soul of the target

mobs.name: Ogre
quips: Me will feast on your flesh!

mobs.name: Demon
quips: Do you flee like a coward?

mobs.name: Patron
quips: Ooh I think I've drunk too much.

mobs.name: Priest
quips: Where did I put the holy water?
Tell me what troubles you my child.

mobs.name: Parishioner
quips: Forgive me for I have sinned.

mobs.name: Fisher
quips: I caught something, but it wasn't a fish!

character_classes.name: Warrior
character_classes.description: Strength, Melee Weapons, Shields, Heavy Armour

passives.name: Two-Handed Melee Weapon Mastery
passives.description: Improve your effectiveness when wielding a two-handed melee weapon.

passives.name: Shield Mastery
passives.description: Improve your effectiveness when wielding a one-handed melee weapon and shield.

passives.name: Fire Mastery
passives.description: Improve your mastery over fire magic.

passives.name: Lightning Mastery
passives.description: Improves your mastery over lightning magic.

passives.name: Cold Mastery
passives.description: Improves your mastery over cold magic.

passives.name: Chaos Mastery
passives.description: Improves your mastery over chaos magic.

passives.name: Hunter
passives.description: Improve your effectiveness when wielding a bow.

passives.name: Assassin
passives.description: Improve your effectiveness when dual-wielding one-handed weapons.
